name: KiwiQA Services
tag_list: automated-testing, installation-testing, web-apps-testing, software-product-testing, usability-ui-testing, compatibility-testing, configuration-testing, cross-browser-testing, multi-platform-testing, core--functional-testing, test-management-and-planning
description: Avail Our Services, Secure Your Software
overview:
Are you not certain about your software’s quality, its load bearing capacity and security standards?

That’s what we, at KiwiQA Services Pvt. Ltd., are here to assist you with. With our enriching experience, rich track record and quantifiable deliverable, you can be certain about the rigors that your software would go through before being approved by us. We take pride in such values of our company as:

 Innovation  Loyalty  Fairness  Quality  Integrity  Passion

Our firm’s headquarters are based in India while our multiple sales offices mark their presence in various other locations of the globe.
VERTICALS: We offer our services to many different industry verticals. A list of them is provided below:

• Enterprise Application • Banking • Insurance • Retail • Supply Chain • Mobile • Telecom • Healthcare • E-commerce & auctions

Engage, Experience, Excel

At KiwiQA Services, we love challenges and have a proven expertise in offering simple solutions to complex problems. A large part of the credit for this accomplishment goes to our highly qualified team which has the desired acumen and the technical prowess to offer testing quality of the highest plinth. Some of our clients’ testimonials can bear testimony to the finesse with which we have executed their projects. Come experience Quality Assurance like never before. Come experience Quality like never before.
